substitution.copyText: " Neptunes salt wash, and Tellus orb’d the ground, | " And thirty dozen Moons with borrowed sheen | " About the world have times twelve thirties been,
" And womens fear and love hold quantity, | " Either none, in neither ought, or in extremity,
And thou shalt live in this fair world behind
substitution.amendedText: But though shalt live in this fair world behind

substitution.copyText: The instances that second marriage move | Are base respects of thrift but none of love: | " A second time I kill my husband dead | " When second husband kisses me in bed.

Purpose is but the slave to memory, | Of violent birth and poor validity; | Which now like fruits unripe sticks on the tree, | But fall unshaken, when they mellow be. | Most necessary ’tis that we forget | To pay our selves what to our selves is debt: | What to our selves in passion we propose, | The passion ending doth the purpose lose; | " The violence of either grief or joy | " Their own enactures with themselves destroy; | " Where joy most revels grief doth most lament.
